channel.title: 474 Server + Client! Easy to use for all noobs+experts!
channel.description:
Hey, I have noticed there are hardly any 474s going around so I decided to make a working 474 starting base for all to use/work on. I've finally fixed it :)
This starting base includes:
474 Client: 317 maps fully working. Cache is included, don't need to move it anywhere. Maps are included too. Note: Run the server before running the 474 client or else it won't work.
474 Server: Basic 474. Non-Sql, just log in with any username or password(like normal). Equipment tab partially done, except it loads restore potions instead of worn armour. All commands working, such as ::item 11694 1, for Armadyl godsword. Some interfaces and buttons added + fixed. Spawns at Edgeville bank. Sendmessage left to fix, I cba to fix it.
[url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=90S8M0ST]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=90S8M0ST[/url] [url=http://www.2shared.com/file/4530782/eb520df6/Starting474.html]http://www.2shared.com/file/4530782/eb520df6/Starting474.html[/url] [url=http://rapidshare.com/files/177308299/Starting474.rar.html]http://rapidshare.com/files/177308299/Starting474.rar.html[/url]
If any of the links don't work, don't hesitate to PM me!! I am happy to upload links at anytime!
Credits: Shiver Cellkyborg Me
Thanks, Bandos.
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/29z65j9.png[/img] Armadyl godsword special! - Just click the house tab! [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2iqmtk6.png[/img] Bandos godsword special! - Just click the house tab! [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/dvga9.png[/img] Saradomin godsword special! - Just click the house tab! [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/33yqp77.png[/img] Zamorak godsword special! - Just click the house tab! [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/245gc5c.png[/img] New Style Stats! [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/23vezog.png[/img] Items kept on death! You have to edit the sendframes which I will post. [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/27zk8lz.png[/img] New magic spellbook with old Teleblock lolol [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2yugil5.png[/img] New Prayers! [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2s0yfj7.png[/img] Holding godswords!! REAL RS WAY!

@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“Wayra, post:189, topic:253322”]Got 2 errors when I tried running the server:

  2. Error: server running too fast[/quote]Good job! Bump a 6 year old source! High five!

item.title: 474 Server + Client! Easy to use for all noobs+experts!
item.dc:creator: @oldschool-scape oldschool-scape
item.description:
@oldschool-scape wrote:

Crossibow:

Hi, if anyone could help me with making a Run.bat file for 64bit mashines? and maybe also a the server running file for 64bit mashines… im kinda stuck in here… other than that, very nice source i would REALLY appeciate it, if you could help me. THANK YOU .

Oke so if u got jre6 it will be this ( if its in program files (x86) if its on normal program files just remove the (x86).

@echo off title Rune474 "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -cp src;c3p0-0.9.1.1.jar;sqljdbc.jar;mysql-connector-java-5.0.5-bin.jar net.Bandos.server.server pause

and if u got jdk

@echo off title Rune474 "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_##\bin" -cp src;c3p0-0.9.1.1.jar;sqljdbc.jar;mysql-connector-java-5.0.5-bin.jar net.Bandos.server.server pause

Change the ## to ur version

Read full topic

item.title: 474 Server + Client! Easy to use for all noobs+experts!
item.dc:creator: @King_Krow King Krow
item.description:
@King_Krow wrote:

[quote=“Yarrrr, post:126, topic:253322”]The only one that didnt work was the Run.bat for the server.
It’s un-edited and says

@echo off
title Rune474
java -cp src;c3p0-0.9.1.1.jar;sqljdbc.jar;mysql-connector-java-5.0.5-bin.jar net.Bandos.server.server
pause

I don’t know what to change. I have JDK 6 update 13, and if you can edit it for me I’d be really happy.[/quote]

Read full topic
